Airport slogans material

Hong Kong – the land shrouded in tear gas long expired
We stopped counting the rounds they fired

Your safety is now at stake
Blows so hard that umbrellas break

Come join us in this deadly game of dodge
Our heads are where the bullets lodge

Cops hurl fireworks at you from above
Whilst gangsters stab you in the name of love

Are you ready for the excitement of the night?
Caught dressed in black will give you all the fright

Talk to cops and you might get hit
So just run like your life depends on it
